<div class="contact-container">

<h2>Get in Touch 💬</h2>
<p>If you have any questions, collaborations, or opportunities, feel free to leave a message below. I'll get back to you as soon as possible!</p>

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/xwpbyzoj" method="POST" class="contact-form">
  <label for="name">👤 Your Name</label>
  <input type="text" name="name" placeholder="John Doe" required>

  <label for="email">📧 Your Email</label>
  <input type="email" name="_replyto" placeholder="you@example.com" required>

  <label for="message">📝 Your Message</label>
  <textarea name="message" rows="6" placeholder="Type your message here..." required></textarea>

  <button type="submit">🚀 Send Message</button>
</form>

</div>
